original_text: And the Lord said to me, “Throw it to the potter”—the handsome price at which they valued me! So I took the thirty pieces of silver and threw them to the potter at the house of the Lord.
korean_text: 여호와께서 내게 이르시되 그들이 나를 헤아린 바 그 삯을 토기장이에게 던지라 하시기로 내가 곧 그 은 삼십 개를 여호와의 전에서 토기장이에게 던지고

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said to me
the handsome price at which they valued me
So I took the thirty pieces of silver
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 내가 은 삼십 개를 가져다가

sentences.original_text: and threw them to the potter
at the house of the Lord
